00073 typedef std::string string;
00074 
00075 struct strsrt
00076 {
00077     bool operator()(const string str1, const string str2) const
00078     { return strcmp(str1.c_str(), str2.c_str()) < 0; }
00079 };

00088 class Mob2DLog
00089 {
00090     public:
00091         static Mob2DLog* Instance() { if(!m_pInstance) m_pInstance = new Mob2DLog; return m_pInstance; }

00095

00101
